synthesis_conditions.equipment: Parr Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (23 mL)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with 3 × 10 mL of Nanopure water
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: allowed to dry in air overnight
synthesis_conditions.stability: stable in air and insoluble in water and all common organic solvents such as ethanol, acetonitrile, tetrahydrofuran, 1,2-dichloroethane, acetone, and N,N‘-dimethylformamide

synthesis_conditions.preparation_method: ground and dehydrated according to the procedure for Tb2(BDC)3
synthesis_conditions.exposure: exposed to 40 psi of anhydrous ammonia gas for 20 min
